extendedInfo.description: Cantcha, Inc., the makers of iMissal, have teamed up with the Daughters of St. Paul to develop a comprehensive daily Saint application.  Saint-a-Day is built using content from the extremely popular Saint-a-Day books from the Daughters of St. Paul through their publishing house, Pauline Books & Media.. The application is useful as a reference tool, for daily meditation and prayer, and as a spiritual companion. Saint-a-Day is also practical for teachers, homilists, and leaders who want to bring the lives and examples of the saints into their classrooms, homilies, and groups. Application features include:-  Saint Biographiesâ¢A biography for every day of the year!â¢Quick navigation to today's saint biography.â¢A full liturgical calendar, to quickly navigate to any saint biography of the year.â¢A fully searchable, alphabetic listing of saint biographies.â¢Each biography concludes with a short meditation for the day on what you can learn for your daily life from that saint.â¢Biographies can be emailed to your friends and family to reflect upon.- Prayers to Saintsâ¢Prayers can be displayed alphabetically or by need category (e.g. addiction, sickness, financial struggles, etc.).â¢Prayers can be emailed to others in need, or you can send a novena prayer to join someone in intercession for a special intention.â¢Over 100 saint prayersâ¢You are not alone in your prayer! Prayer intentions can be e-mailed to a community of sisters, the Daughters of St. Paul, who will join you in prayer for your intention. You may even get a response from one of the sisters!- Patronsâ¢Want to know who is the patron saint for your need? Includes a fully searchable patronage listing which can be sorted by saint or patronage.We feel this is the most comprehensive saint application available. Since knowing the saints is actually seeing the Gospel brought to life, Saint-a-Day allows you to reflect on the lives of the saints and imitate them in your own, to turn to them for intercession, make their virtues and gifts your own through prayer, and become a stronger member of the communion of saints by joining others in your prayer.Now you can carry this information with you in your pocket, right where you need it. You can stop in the middle of the day and offer a prayer when someone shares with you a struggle or obstacle and promise them the prayers of a group of sisters for their intention. You can also use it for that quick moment of refreshment and prayer wherever you are able to fit it in!Note: Font size can be adjusted for biography and prayer text by clicking on the information icon on top left of the Today screen.

reviews.title: Perfect Saints app!
reviews.comment: This app is EXACTLY what I was looking for: a Saint of the day app that is easy to use, gives lots of info on the Saints, has a prayer/meditation, & is easy to read. I recommend it to everyone wanting to learn about Saints every day!
reviews.author: Chaplain Weasle Forsythe

reviews.title: More Than I Expected!
reviews.comment: What a good find this is. Very insightful readings EVERY day, and thorough as well. I want to add I found the prayer feature so this app is even better than I thought! 6 STARS!
reviews.author: William Powers

reviews.title: Saint a Day
reviews.comment: This app is absolutly fantastic, it is a constant reminder of those wonderful saints. Its great to learn about them all. We must all become saints what greater way then learning about them and trying to incorporate their examples into our own lives.
reviews.author: Jocelyne Rauch

reviews.title: Wonderful App
reviews.comment: Thank you for creating a concise database of Saints with different sorting options and calendar. Beautiful. Haven\'t seen better.
reviews.author: Solveig Colaianni

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Only thing is that I wish you could change the front. Other than that,  I think it\'s great
reviews.author: David Altendorf

reviews.title: Useful apps
reviews.comment: A very good source of  information. It is a useful tool to know and pray to a particular saint. It helps me to learn and  grow in faith each day.  I recommend this.
reviews.author: Harvey Thommes

reviews.title: An excellent reminder that we are all called to become Saints
reviews.comment: Thanks for this App...  Every time I read the lives of saints,  I am reminded that all humans are called to become Saints... Thanks to all the Saints who sincerely offered their lives to our Creator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Blessing a Day
reviews.comment: This program both reminds me of and teaches me about the Saints.  I\'ve learned so much from its wealth of knowledge!
reviews.author: Salli Dickerson

reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
reviews.comment: I love this app! I have had no issues with it so far. It is accurate, informative, tastefully made and extremely convenient-- a great daily way to keep the Saints in our prayers and petition for the same! With the alphabetical or patronage index it makes it easy to find the Saint you are looking for!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does what you\'d expect. No problems.
reviews.author: Michelle Langlois

reviews.title: Wonderful and detailed
reviews.comment: Wish there were more prayers, devotions for some of the lesser known saints, but is still an extremely comprehensive list.
reviews.author: Jennifer Warwick

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Everything that I could have asked for and what a bargain for the wealth of information
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed unless an update
reviews.comment: A pretty nice app. Does what it says and has a lot of saints but i wonder if will more saints be added in an updated. The reason why i am giving two stars is because my patron saint, st. Philomena,  isn\'t here. I was hoping to have her prayers in my tab any time. I wish more prayers and more patronages could be added soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential app for every catholic
reviews.comment: Great app. Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: Kevin B

reviews.title: Saint a day
reviews.comment: Very helpful in spiritual practice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Great app..helps you with a brief description, to understand how saints lived their lives in their situations and how we could be like them. Love it.
reviews.author: Rajwin Chandy

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: You should be able to access the info for each saint from the Patrons page. It doesn\'t list all the patronages. The info for each is skimpy. It doesn\'t have all the saints for each day. The Prayers section is neat. Really i\'d like an online martyrology, with complete info like Butler\'s, and with the categories of info like the Wikipedia profiles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YouthGroupNut
reviews.comment: I love being able to ask for the intersession of our saints in hard times so this is a great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: I really love this app. It has given me a lot of information about Saints l didn\'t know about. As a new Catholic l have found it very helpful. I would like to request more info on Blessed Kateri Tekeqwitha (l believe l spelled that right). I would like to see prayers for her as well. Other than that lm very happy with this app. Thank you so much!! God Bless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Manase
reviews.comment: A very handy reminder and companion. Reading this, in addition to my Mass readings makes my day complete.
reviews.author: A Google User
